pkgmetadata.longdescription: Processing Agro-Environmental Data // A set of tools for processing and analyzing data developed in the context of the "Who Has Eaten the Planet" (WHEP) project, funded by the European Research Council (ERC). For more details on multi- regional inputoutput model "Food and Agriculture Biomass InputOutput" (FABIO) see Bruckner et al. (2019) doi:10.1021/acs.est.9b03554.
